name: A Game of Cat and Mouse (Verburner)
name_original: A Game of Cat and Mouse (Verburner)
description:
This game is the result of my first attempts at both Blender and Unity. I used a bunch of free assets.

Music from https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/

normal music: "A really dark alley" - Loyalty Freak Music
chase music: "Face-to-face tension" – Komiku

Sounds from https://freesound.org/

cat meowing: "cat_meowing" - nekoninja
scratching: "scratching.mp3" - leftovertunacasserole

External 3d models from https://assetstore.unity.com/

Chest of Drawers - Ciconia Studio
Dark Fantasy Kit Lite - Runemark Studio
Free Medieval Room - Omni Studio
Gardening Tools Pack - Donopardo
Mess Maker Free - The Quantum Nexus
Patio Sofa Set - Ivan Loginov
Stylized Wood Textures - Camisado Studios
Table - Mash Virual
Wooden PBR Table - Intercido
